last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Romance is dialled up for the final dates outside of the Retreat before the kids are reunited with their parent and their potential new partner in order to ask their pressing questions. Fresh from these reunions, the kids have one last big decision to make when giving their blessing to their new relationships. Will the kids approve of their newfound love, or are some obstacles too big to overcome?

name: My Mum, Your Dad
overview: A dating show with a difference for the whole family, My Mum, Your Dad follows a group of single parents who have been nominated by their grown-up kids for a second chance at love. Across 10 hour-long episodes, audiences will be able to follow the single parents, from all over the UK, and all walks of life, as they live together at a stunning country house retreat with one objective: to find true love.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Dating show hosted by Davina McCall, which follows eight single parents who have been nominated by their grown-up children to spend two weeks in a scountryside retreat for a second chance at love. The nervous parents are dropped-off at the doors of the retreat by their kids, who all meet at the `Bunker", where Davina reveals that they will be watching their parents' every move from a surveillance room. Here they must secretly guide them on their path to finding love, under the guise of dating experts

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Davina heads into the retreat to see how the grown-ups are getting on. Some of the parents open up to her about their past relationships, and Davina has to console Monique who wonders if she'll ever find love. Later, the children get to make their first dating decision

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The parents take part in a workshop where they are encouraged to acknowledge resentments of the past which some are struggling to let go of, but the workshop also leaves questions when not everyone shares their past. At the end of this episode, there is another surprise that brings hope for some

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: With more single parents now in the retreat, the kids get another opportunity to pair them up for dates. Sparks fly between one of the couples with one person becoming emotional when she sees a different side to her mum, while another is left hopeful at her dad's growing confidence. In the evening, there is a surprise in store and feathers are ruffled. Davina McCall hosts

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The parents prepare for a school disco-themed party which causes temperatures to rise. A new connection starts to form, leaving one grown-up kid disappointed for her mum. One of yesterday's new arrivals plays with fire, and what has the grown-up kids cringing behind their cushions? Davina McCall hosts

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The parents take part in a group task which has the grown-up children reaching for the cushions again as they watch their parents getting closer. Meanwhile back at The Bunker, the grown-up children are given a new task by Davina. With a tough choice to make, which parents are in for a new surprise?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The children are thrilled when sparks fly between two parents they choose to go on a date, but one dad's refusal to commit leaves him in danger of losing two potential connections. Meanwhile at The Bunker, the youngsters are tasked with making another difficult decision

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The grown-up children are tasked with helping their parents during a workshop. With emotions at an all time high in the retreat, the parents open up on their journeys so far. Later in the day difficult conversations are had - do the kids think their parents have made the right choices?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As the end approaches, the romance is ramped up in the retreat. The couples are all sent on extravagant dates where they discuss their journey so far and plans for the future. That evening the parents then write their kids letters, leading to high emotions from their children. Davina McCall hosts

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Davina McCall shocks the parents when revealing the grown-up kids' role in their journey at the retreat. Fresh from this, the parents are told that their kids will make one last big decision when giving their blessing on their new relationships. At an emotional reunion, hearts are on the line as everyone bares their soul. Will the kids approve of their new found love, or will there be a shocking revelation?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Davina McCall hosts the return of the relationship show where eight single parents are nominated by their grown-up children to spend two weeks in a countryside retreat giving love a second chance. To get things started, the children decide who their parents will have their first date with - and while promising connections are made, there are embarrassing moments for those watching revealing conversations about past relationships.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A new dad causes a stir as he gets to know the mums with some speed dating. Davina heads to the Retreat to catch up with the parents after their first dates and some of them share their vulnerabilities around finding love. One mum opens up as she reveals the reason her marriage broke down and the kids choose who they want their parents to spend some extra one-on-one time with while they cook the evening meal.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The parents take part in a self-reflection workshop which proves to be more emotional than expected. The kids choose which parents will go on a pottery date and an unexpected connection begins to grow at the Retreat.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A blossoming romance develops further on a dancing date, a new mum arrival sends ripples through the Retreat, another mum begins to realise her feelings for one of the dads but holds back for fear of breaking the girl code, and there's a big surprise in store for everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Parents channel the wild west for a hoedown party with some intimate conversations leading to a first kiss. One of the mums has an emotional breakthrough during a game, and another plucks up the courage to ask a dad on a date, with a surprising outcome. Davina McCall hosts.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: One couple get closer as another hit a bump in the road, while a seaside date features an intervention from the children. An intimate moment between two parents causes their kids to reach for the cushions, and a game of truths brings the parents together before Davina McCall delivers a revelation.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The parents take part in an intimacy workshop while the kids look on in horror. One of the dads has a potential new rival and two kids give their parents a mid-date pep talk. One couple have a meaningful heart-to-heart but one of their kids is not convinced on the commitment of her mother's love interest.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The parents share what they've learned from their experience so far and two of the parents begin to work out their feelings during a game of basketball. One dad gets a much needed face-to-face chat with his daughter and one of the mums considers walking away as she questions whether her connection will work in the real world.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The kids write their parents a note about what they want to leave behind when leaving the Retreat, and the parents hear how far they've come through their children's eyes in an emotional final workshop. Davina McCall checks in on the parents and see who wants to continue with their connections or if it's time to leave and be reunited with their kids.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Romance is dialled up for the final dates outside of the Retreat before the kids are reunited with their parent and their potential new partner in order to ask their pressing questions. Fresh from these reunions, the kids have one last big decision to make when giving their blessing to their new relationships. Will the kids approve of their newfound love, or are some obstacles too big to overcome?
